modName: Tales of Lycanthropy - Werewolf Overhaul - German Translatio
summary: German Translation of Brevi\'s \"Tales of Lycanthropy\".
descriptionHtml:
This is the German Translation of Brevi\'s huge Werewolf-Overhaul \"Tales of Lycanthropy\".

You don\'t have to download the Original Plug-In, it\'s all included in this Download file. Just downlad and install. 

Please notice the loading hierarchy:
- Lycanthropy_Audio_by_Brevi.esm
- Lycanthropy_Main_by_Brevi.esp
- Tales of Lycanthropy.esp

If you don\'t load the plug-in in this order, there will be bugs and so on. 

I have to thank Brevi for let me work on this translation!
author: Brevi
